name: B-26C Invader
variantdescription: This is a B-26C with a glass nose, wing guns, only the dorsal turret, and extra fuel (40 fuel points). This variant was originally built for WW2 service in the Pacific, but also served in the Korean War.
variantnotes: Bomb system is ballistic (-1) if doing level bombing from four or more altitude levels above the target.
